name: Accelerated First-Year Swedish
description: Six lecture hours a week for one semester, with optional laboratory available. Prerequisite: Two high school units or the equivalent in another foreign language, or consent of instructor.

name: Accelerated Second-Year Swedish
description: Six lecture hours a week for one semester, with optional laboratory available. Prerequisite: Swedish 604 or an appropriate score on the placement test.

name: Conference Course in Swedish Language or Literature
description: Supervised individual study of selected problems in Swedish language or literature. Conference course.  May be repeated for credit. Prerequisite: Upper-division standing and consent of instructor.
